```{r setup, include=FALSE}
qcMetrics =  read.delim("/Volumes/Beta/data/flow/QCeval/all.mini.qc.txt",stringsAsFactors = FALSE,sep = "\t") 
qcMetrics$Name.file =paste(qcMetrics$Name.file,".fcs",sep = "")
```

## Anomaly distributions

```{r echo=FALSE}
library(knitr)

library(ggplot2)
theme_set(theme_bw(20))


ggplot(qcMetrics, aes(n..of.events)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 300)+ylab("Number of Samples")+xlab("Number of events")

ggplot(qcMetrics, aes(X..anomalies)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 300)+ylab("Number of Samples")+xlab("% Total anomalies (Flow Rate and Flow Margin)")

ggplot(qcMetrics, aes(X..anomalies.Signal)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 300)+ylab("Number of Samples")+xlab("% Signal acquisition anomalies (not used)")
ggplot(qcMetrics, aes(X..anomalies.Margins)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 300)+ylab("Number of Samples")+xlab("% Margins anomalies")


```
